text: But in reply He said to them, “You feed them!”They had no way of expecting such a response, since humanly speaking it was ridiculously impossible. In the end, the solution did pass through their hands, but unless Jesus was joking (which I doubt), He was telling them to perform the miracle, before they had seen it done. Wow! They say to Him, “Shall we go and buy two hundred denarii worth of bread and feed them?”
